comment._content: And all those babies are undoubtedly gone forever

comment.author: 94838406@N07
comment._content: Simpler times when mothers enjoyed their children, breastfed , didnt immunize, or mutilate with circumsion, probably co-slept.. When the media wasnt a guide book for parenting! good times, beautiful babies and their beautiful mommas!
